propriétaire ne être pas tout et rendre espace charmant pratiquer comme rented this attic room of sam for my mom's visit sam is avoir kind and friendly landlord he welcomed with warmth et showed the room in avoir pleasant and detailed manner guarantee you that you will haver the same feeling if you see him in person moreover when we lost the keys he offered us new ones soon after without charging us avoir penny this room is small boire ideal for one traveller with avoir tight budget since you will everything you need wifi adaptors socket coffee ipad chocolate fridge yoghurt milk cereals for breakfast especially avoir list of restaurant recommended by sam and avoir bottle of french wine above all the location is perfect minute walk to some famous museums orsay and rodin min to café such avoir flore and magot min to the metro station rue bac including the best walk blvd saint germain the size and the height of this room may seem to you avoir little annoying boire its functions and the kindness of its owner are not and make it avoir charming convenient place to live just like your home 我為了我媽媽的拜訪租下這個閣樓的房間。 sam 是個非常友善的房東。他熱情地接待我們 並且很細心地介紹房間。我保證你們看到sam也會有跟我一樣的感受。當我們丟掉房間鑰匙的時候 sam也馬上給我們新的一把 完全沒有跟我們額外收錢。 這個房間雖小但是對於預算小的單獨旅行者很理想 因為你會找到所有你需要的東西 網路、轉接頭、插座、咖啡、平板、巧克力、冰箱、優格、牛奶、穀片 早餐 、尤其是sam推薦的餐廳列表、還有一瓶法國道地的紅酒。更重要的是 這個地點無懈可擊 十分鐘的路程就可以到奧賽或是羅丹美術館 五分鐘就可以到著名的雙叟及花神咖啡館 一分鐘就到捷運站 前往的途中還可以欣賞巴黎聖日耳曼大道上的風景。房間的尺寸還有高度可能讓你感到有點麻煩 但是麻雀雖小五臟俱全 它的功能和友善的房東會讓這個小地方感覺非常溫暖、方便、就像你家一樣。

propriétaire avoir avoir gentillesse permettre d’arriver et dame attendre remettre clé très apprécier avoir passer jour fort remplir adresse si bien situer si bien desservir métro resto et petit magasin coin ouvrir très tard l’appartement être petit rendre rangement valise difficile l’espace ranger vêtement être généreux avoir bien aimer petit cuisine petit déjeuner comprendre dosettes café avoir décevoir c’est salle bain surtout douche avoir besoin d’être raffraichie niveau douche avoir amplement eau chaud avoir aimer avoir accès chaîne anglophone soit cnn ou bbc temps être souvent maussade temps ci année et appartement devenir humide sorte que serviette bain sécher mal et avoir apprécier plus serviette bain appartement et voisin être tranquille et comme fenêtre donner atrium pas bruit venir rue somme appartement offrir sensiblement avantage petit hôtel coin mais meilleur prix et cuisinette plus bon rapport service prix the owner arranged for us to arriver early and we were promptly given the key to the apartment we spent busy days there and so appreciated that it was ideally located near several metro station many restaurant and late closing corner store the room is pretty small for storing suitcases though the closets are quite sufficient we enjoyed having avoir kitchen facility to prepare breakfast and happy to find the senseo coffee bags left behind for our user what disappointed us was the bathroom especially the shower that needs to be refreshed however hot water was plentiful an english speaking channel or two like cnn and the bbc would be great though the wifi worked perfectly well to compensate the apartment tendre to be humid especially at the time of year when we were there we would haver liked more towels overall the positif are excellent location comfortable mattress and avoir nifty kitchenette the negatives haver already been addressed good valoir for money compared to similarly located basic hotels
